events.message: I just received my order, but the laptop screen has a large scratch on it and it seems faulty. Please help!
The case has been reviewed and categorized as related to product defect due to reported damage and faulty device.
A support agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the screen defect issue you have reported.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the scratch on your laptop screen. I'll do my best to help you resolve this.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratched screen and the order number to proceed with the investigation?
Here is the photo showing the scratch clearly on the screen. The order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a replacement unit or a refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to receive a replacement laptop rather than a refund, thanks for the prompt reply.
Your replacement has been processed and will be shipped within 3 business days. You will receive tracking details soon.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is in perfect condition.
Yes, I received the replacement today, and the laptop is in excellent condition. Thank you for your support!
We are happy to hear that everything is satisfactory. We will now proceed to close your support case.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
